content: अधिष्ठातृ [स्था-तृच्] Superintending, watching over, presiding over, guiding, governing; tutelary, guardian; as °त्री देवता a guardian or presiding deity. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} (ता) A superintendent, head, chief, protector, controller, regulator, ruler; सर्वेंद्रियाधिष्ठाता <ls>Bhāṣā P.</ls>; especially with reference to the Almighty who is the ruler of the universe. See अधिदेव also.
